mods.note: MAP 11. PREPARED IN THE HISTORICAL SECTION OF THE COMMITTEE OF IMPERIAL DEFENCE. Ordnance S'urvey 1924.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 11. TO ILLUSTRATE THE DEFENCE OF KUT AL AMARA: December 1915, to April 1916.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 269 x 238mm, on sheet 355 x 320mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume II, and shows a region around Kut [Al KÅ«t] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, fortifications, built-up areas, roads, palm groves and watercourses. A short note describes Turkish fortifications.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1924.
